metadata.title: Legal Information - StudyHub
metadata.description: Privacy policy, terms of service, security information, and contact details for StudyHub.

informationWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.description: We collect information to provide, improve, and personalize our services:

howWeUseInfo.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUseInfo.description: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
howWeUseInfo.provideService: To provide and maintain our services
howWeUseInfo.communicate: To communicate with you about updates and support
howWeUseInfo.improve: To improve and personalize your experience
howWeUseInfo.security: To ensure security and prevent fraud

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.description: We may share your information in the following circumstances:
dataSharing.serviceProviders: With trusted service providers who assist in our operations
dataSharing.legalRequirements: When required by law or legal process
dataSharing.businessTransfer: In connection with a business transfer or merger

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.description: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
yourRights.access: Right to access your personal data

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience and analyze usage patterns.
cookies.management: You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By accessing and using StudyHub, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

description.title: Service Description
description.content: StudyHub is a collaborative learning platform that provides study rooms, real-time chat, note-taking tools, and Pomodoro timers for students and educators.

userAccounts.title: User Accounts
userAccounts.description: When you create an account, you must provide accurate and complete information:
userAccounts.accurateInfo: Provide accurate and complete registration information
userAccounts.security: Maintain the security of your account credentials
userAccounts.notification: Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use
userAccounts.termination: We may terminate accounts that violate these terms

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.description: You agree to use StudyHub only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms:
acceptableUse.compliance: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
acceptableUse.respectful: Be respectful and considerate of other users
acceptableUse.noHarassment: No harassment, bullying, or abusive behavior
acceptableUse.noSpam: No spam, advertising, or commercial solicitation
acceptableUse.noMalware: No viruses, malware, or harmful code

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: StudyHub and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by StudyHub and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.
intellectualProperty.userContent: You retain ownership of content you create, but grant us a license to use it for service provision.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs your use of the service.

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.description: The service is provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis:
disclaimers.availability: No guarantee of uninterrupted service availability
disclaimers.accuracy: No guarantee of content accuracy or completeness

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.description: In no event shall StudyHub be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages.

termination.title: Termination
termination.description: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice, for any reason.
termination.effects: Upon termination, your right to use the service will cease immediately.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.description: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction where StudyHub operates.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.description: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

overview.title: Security Overview
overview.description: At StudyHub, we take security seriously. We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data and ensure a safe learning environment.
overview.commitment: Our commitment to security is fundamental to our mission of providing a trusted platform for collaborative learning.

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: All sensitive data is encrypted in transit and at rest using industry-standard encryption protocols.

authentication.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
authentication.description: Secure authentication with support for OAuth providers and additional security measures.

monitoring.title: 24/7 Security Monitoring
monitoring.description: Continuous monitoring and threat detection to identify and respond to security incidents.

accessControl.title: Role-Based Access Control
accessControl.description: Granular permissions and access controls to ensure users only access appropriate resources.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.description: We implement comprehensive data protection measures:
dataProtection.encryption: Data encryption at rest and in transit

bestPractices.title: Security Best Practices
bestPractices.description: We recommend following these security best practices:
bestPractices.regularUpdates: Keep your software and devices updated

incidentResponse.title: Incident Response
incidentResponse.description: We have established procedures for responding to security incidents:

reporting.title: Reporting Security Issues
reporting.description: If you discover a security vulnerability or incident, please report it immediately.

compliance.title: Compliance
compliance.description: We maintain compliance with relevant security and privacy standards:
compliance.ferpa: Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (FERPA)

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: For security-related questions or concerns, please contact us:

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Get in touch with our team. We're here to help with any questions, feedback, or support you need.
contact.getInTouchDescription: Have a question or need support? We're here to help. Reach out to us through any of the methods below.

email.title: Email Support
email.description: Send us an email and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

support.title: Support Response
support.description: We typically respond to support requests within 24 hours.

hours.title: Support Hours
hours.description: Our support team is available to help you.

form.title: Send us a Message
form.subject: Subject
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help you...

help.title: Help Center
help.description: Find answers to your questions and learn how to use StudyHub effectively.

search.title: Search for Help
search.description: Can't find what you're looking for? Search our help articles and guides.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: Learn the basics of StudyHub and how to create your first study session.

studyRooms.title: Study Rooms
studyRooms.description: Everything you need to know about creating and managing study rooms.

timers.title: Pomodoro Timers
timers.description: How to use synchronized timers for focused study sessions.

chat.title: Real-time Chat
chat.description: Learn about the chat features and how to communicate with study partners.

notes.title: Notes & Collaboration
notes.description: How to create, share, and collaborate on notes within study rooms.

account.title: Account & Settings
account.description: Manage your account, profile, and platform settings.

howToJoin.question: How do I join a study room?
howToJoin.answer: You can join a study room by clicking on the room name from the rooms list, or by using a room code if it's a private room.

createRoom.question: How do I create my own study room?
createRoom.answer: Click the 'Create Room' button on the dashboard, fill in the room details, and invite your study partners.

syncTimers.question: How do synchronized timers work?
syncTimers.answer: When a timer is started in a study room, it syncs across all members. Everyone starts and ends their study sessions together.

privateNotes.question: Are my notes private?
privateNotes.answer: Yes, your personal notes are private to you. You can choose to share specific notes with room members if you want.

contact.title: Still Need Help?
contact.description: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our support team is here to help.

community.title: Community
community.description: Join thousands of students worldwide who are learning together and achieving their goals.

studyGroups.title: Study Groups
studyGroups.description: Form study groups with students who share your academic interests and goals.

discussions.title: Discussions
discussions.description: Engage in meaningful discussions about subjects, share insights, and learn from peers.

resources.title: Shared Resources
resources.description: Access and share study materials, notes, and educational resources with the community.

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.description: Earn badges and recognition for your study progress and contributions to the community.

join.title: Join Our Community
join.description: Ready to connect with fellow learners? Join StudyHub and start your collaborative learning journey.

docs.title: Documentation
docs.description: Comprehensive guides and API documentation to help you get the most out of StudyHub.

quickStart.step1: Create an account and sign in to StudyHub
quickStart.step2: Create or join a study room
quickStart.step4: Begin collaborating with your study partners

userGuide.title: User Guide
userGuide.description: Complete guide to using StudyHub features and functionality.

api.description: Technical documentation for integrating with StudyHub APIs.

integration.title: Integration Guide
integration.description: Learn how to integrate StudyHub with your existing tools and workflows.

admin.title: Admin Guide
admin.description: Administrative tools and settings for managing StudyHub instances.

examples.title: Code Examples
examples.description: Practical examples and code snippets for common use cases.

community.title: Community
community.description: Connect with other developers and users in our community.

tutorials.title: Video Tutorials
tutorials.description: Step-by-step video tutorials for getting started with StudyHub.

support.title: Need Help?
support.description: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help.

hero.subtitle: Join synchronized study sessions with friends. Share notes, chat in real-time, and stay motivated with collaborative learning.
hero.trustedBy: Join the Future of Collaborative Learning
hero.footer: Free to start • No credit card required • Join 10,000+ students worldwide

features.subtitle: Discover powerful tools that revolutionize how you study, collaborate, and achieve your academic goals

synchronizedTimers.title: Synchronized Timers
synchronizedTimers.description: Pomodoro timers that sync across all room members for focused study sessions with breaks in perfect harmony

personalNotes.title: Personal Notes
personalNotes.description: Create and organize your personal notes within study rooms. Keep your thoughts private while staying connected to your study groups.

groupChat.title: Group Chat
groupChat.description: Instant messaging within study rooms to discuss topics, share resources, and stay connected

studyRooms.title: Study Rooms
studyRooms.description: Create or join public/private rooms with role-based permissions and member management

realTimeSync.title: Real-time Sync
realTimeSync.description: Everything updates instantly across all devices and participants with lightning-fast performance

securePrivate.title: Secure & Private
securePrivate.description: Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security, encryption, and privacy controls

about.title: Empowering Students Worldwide
about.description: StudyHub was born from a simple belief: learning is more effective, enjoyable, and sustainable when done together. We're on a mission to create the ultimate collaborative learning platform.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To democratize education by providing students worldwide with powerful, accessible tools that foster collaboration, enhance focus, and build lasting learning communities. We believe every student deserves the opportunity to learn, grow, and succeed together.

collaboration.title: Collaboration First
collaboration.description: We believe the best learning happens when students work together, share knowledge, and support each other.

innovation.title: Continuous Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly evolve our platform with cutting-edge features that enhance the learning experience.

community.title: Strong Community
community.description: Building inclusive, supportive communities where every student feels valued and empowered to succeed.

accessibility.title: Universal Access
accessibility.description: Making quality educational tools accessible to students everywhere, regardless of their background or resources.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded by a team of educators and technologists, StudyHub emerged from our own experiences struggling with isolated study methods during university. We witnessed firsthand how powerful collaborative learning could be, but existing tools were fragmented and difficult to use.
story.paragraph2: Today, StudyHub serves students across 25+ countries, facilitating over 100,000 study sessions and fostering learning communities that extend far beyond virtual study rooms. We're proud to be part of each student's journey toward academic success.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Study Sessions?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of students already using StudyHub to achieve their learning goals together. Start your collaborative learning journey today.
